name: custom_dice_rolls
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dice_roll_simulator.
Tool description: Roll as many dice of any size as many times you want with the ultimate dice rolling API.
API description: Roll any number of dice with a specified number of sides a specified number of times using the Dice Roll Simulator API.

dice.description: The number of dice to roll. Defaults to 3.

sides.description: The number of sides on each die. Defaults to 8.

rolls.description: The number of times to roll the dice. Defaults to '2'.
